entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Testhost.exe does not find '7.0.0-preview.6.22324.4' runtime when running tests #26462
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure struct fields follow LayoutKind #26460
  • Azure Dev ops msbuild failing for package of .net 6.0 Service fabric project with error in Microsoft.NET.Publish.targets #26459
  • Define precedence relationship with MSBuild properties and CLI args #26447
  • Improve RID and `publish` UX #26446
  • Enable publishing a self-contained app with `PublishSelfContained` #26445
  • Enable publishing for a RID with `PublishRuntimeIdentifier` #26444

Closed

  • Enable publishing as `Release` with `PublishRelease` #23551
    7.0.1xx
  • Support flowing workload dependencies through project and package dependencies #24205
    6.0.4xx
  • Log the WebPublishMethod #26283
  • The " GenerateDepsFile" Task failed unexpectedly #26315
  • Create FabricBot rule for compat issues #26166
    7.0.1xx
  • SDK 6.0.301 breaks clean build with LibLog package #26404

PullRequests

Created

  • Update loc build to main #26464
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch loc build to main #26463
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add --info Option to Workload Base Command For Future Triage #26458
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26420
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log the publish method used when publishing #26287
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 6.0.303
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1862266 #26442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remoev the build retry and increase the test retry #26439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum vs version to 17.2 #24438
  • Simplify caching logic to not try and retain caches between supression #26367
  • Add a notification for the compatibility area #25959
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove transitive dependencies for System.Private.Uri (#25420) #26448
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #26441
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce System.Runtime.TieredPGO knob #26350
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • upgrade our version of newtonsoft #26288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove all of the extra run helix tests scripts for running non-helix… #26438
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet sln add for older 4.7.2 projects wrong configuration #26329
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: May 2022 CTL #26403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26440
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure
